DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability nemonoxacin healthy Chinese volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Oral Nemonoxacin Malate Capsules
DOC.detailed_description: Single dose study : evaluate safety tolerability oral nemonoxacin 125 mg , 250mg , 500mg , 750mg , 1000mg . Multiple dose study : evaluate PK profile oral dos 500mg 750mg nemo consecutive 10 day .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female , age 18 45 screen Male volunteer capable take doublebarrier contraception measure test ( spermicide gel plus condom , instance ) end clinical study cause spouses conceive within three month last administration medication ; subject female , shall become pregnant test within three month study No use tobacco nicotine product within 3 month prior study BMI 1925 Willing abstain coffee caffeine drink study Voluntarily sign inform consent History diabetes , cardiovascular , hepatic renal disease Active digestive disease ( e.g . diarrhea ) Central nervous disease psychiatric disorder Had surgery trauma within 6 month prior study Alcohol drug abuse HIV , HBV HCV positive Used prescribed drug ( include traditional chinese medicine ) within 14 day prior study Donated 400ml blood plasma within 3 month prior study Have abnormal laboratory examination value exceed normal range 10 % Drug allergy Have cardiac disorder family history cardiac disorder Have abnormal 12lead ECG screen Pregnant lactating Participated study within 3 month prior study
